name: aespa
description: aespa is a unique K-Pop group featuring both real members and virtual AI avatars, known for their futuristic concept and powerful performances.

funFacts: Was famous as 'Glass Bead Girl' pre-debut
Known for her 'cute giant baby' personality off-stage
Her real name Jimin means 'wisdom' in Korean
Dating rumors with Lee Jae-wook were confirmed in 2024
One of SM's most talented all-rounders
members.bio: Karina is aespa's leader and the group's ultimate all-rounder. Despite her fierce on-stage persona, she's known as a 'giant baby' for her cute, friendly personality. She trained at SM for years and was famous even before debut.

funFacts: Half Korean, half Japanese
Born and raised in Tokyo, Japan
Fluent in Japanese, Korean, and English
Had the shortest training period in aespa (11 months)
Known for her unique fashion sense and style
members.bio: Giselle is aespa's main rapper and the only member who is half-Japanese. Despite having the shortest training period, her natural talent and trilingual abilities have made her invaluable. She's known for her stylish fashion and friendly personality.

funFacts: Born on January 1st - literally a New Year's baby
Known for her baby lion-like visuals
Has a surprisingly deep, husky voice
Very introverted but opens up to members
Her stage name reflects her cool, mysterious image
members.bio: Winter is aespa's visual and lead vocalist known for her fairy-like visuals and powerful voice. Born on New Year's Day, she brings a mysterious, cool charm to the group. Despite her cold stage name, she's warm with her members.

funFacts: Born in Harbin, China
Known for her extraordinary vocal range and power
Has a '4D' personality - playful and unpredictable
Trained at SM since 2016
Her high notes are considered legendary
members.bio: Ningning is aespa's main vocalist and maknae from China. Her powerful vocals and impressive range have made her one of the best 4th generation vocalists. Despite being the youngest, her confident and playful '4D' personality makes her stand out.

seo.title: aespa Name Generator | Create Your Korean Name with MY
seo.description: Create your aespa name with Karina, Giselle, Winter & Ningning! Instant chemistry scores & Korean stage names. Perfect for MY fanfiction.
